extension.valueString: Information was sought but not found (e.g. patient was asked but didn't know
No proper value is applicable in this context (e.g. last menstrual period for a male)
This information has not been sought (e.g. patient was not asked
Information is not available at this time but it is expected that it will be available later
No information whatsoever can be inferred from this exceptional value. This is the most general exceptional value. It is also the default exceptional value
A proper value is applicable, but not known

description: FHIR Value set/code system definition for HL7 v2 table 0532 ( Expanded Yes/no Indicator)
name: v2 Expanded Yes/no Indicator

text.div:
Expanded Yes/no Indicator

CodeSystemDescriptionCommentVersion
ASKU http://hl7.org/fhir/v3/NullFlavorasked but unknownInformation was sought but not found (e.g. patient was asked but didn't knowadded v2.5
N http://hl7.org/fhir/v2/0136Noadded v2.5
NA http://hl7.org/fhir/v3/NullFlavornot applicableNo proper value is applicable in this context (e.g. last menstrual period for a male)added v2.5
NASK http://hl7.org/fhir/v3/NullFlavornot askedThis information has not been sought (e.g. patient was not askedadded v2.5
NAV http://hl7.org/fhir/v3/NullFlavortemporarily unavailableInformation is not available at this time but it is expected that it will be available lateradded v2.5
NI http://hl7.org/fhir/v3/NullFlavorNo InformationNo information whatsoever can be inferred from this exceptional value. This is the most general exceptional value. It is also the default exceptional valueadded v2.5
NP http://hl7.org/fhir/v3/NullFlavornot presentObsolete as of v 2.7.added v2.5
UNK http://hl7.org/fhir/v3/NullFlavorunknownA proper value is applicable, but not knownadded v2.5
Y http://hl7.org/fhir/v2/0136Yesadded v2.5
